description: Dashboard for data from prometheus-ovs-exporter running on ovs-chassis juju charms

panels.description:
A rate of packets incoming to the datapath that either:
* Hit (match existing flow)
* Miss (not matching existing flow)
* Were lost (dropped before reaching userspace)[0]

[0] https://mail.openvswitch.org/pipermail/ovs-discuss/2023-August/052596.html
panels.title: Datapath Flow Lookups (per second)

panels.description: Total number of megaflow masks in the datapath
panels.title: Megaflow masks

panels.description: The ratio between packets that hit any megaflow mask and total number of packets processed by the datapath (hit/total packets)
panels.title: Megaflow hit ratio

panels.description: Number of packets (per second) that are matched by OVS megaflow masks
panels.title: Megaflow hits (per second)
OVS Interface: $ovs_interface on chassis $juju_unit in model $juju_model ($juju_model_uuid)

panels.description: The observed state of the physical network link of OVS interface
panels.title: Link State

panels.description: Represents the interface index associated with OVS interface
panels.title: Interface Index

panels.description: Maximum burst size for data received on OVS interface, in kb (The default burst size, if set to 0, is 8000 kb)
panels.title: Policing Burst

panels.description: Maximum rate for data received on OVS interface, in kbps (If set to 0, then policing is disabled)
panels.title: Policing Rate

panels.description: The negotiated speed of the physical network link of OVS interface
panels.title: Link speed

panels.description: The currently configured MTU for OVS interface
panels.title: MTU

panels.description: Represents the number of received and transmitted bytes by OVS interface
panels.title: Rx/Tx Bytes

panels.description: Represents the number of received and transmitted packets by OVS interface
panels.title: Tx/Rx Packets

panels.description: Represents the number of output/input packets dropped by OVS interface
panels.title: Rx/Tx Drops

panels.description: The number of times Open vSwitch has observed the link_state of OVS interface change
panels.title: Link reset

panels.description: Various error rates for the received packets on the OVS interface (in packets/s)
panels.title: Rx Errors

panels.description: Error rates for the transmitted packets on the OVS interface (in packets/s)
panels.title: Tx Errors

title: Juju: OVN Chassis
